title: SymSeqBench: a unified framework for the generation and analysis of rule-based symbolic sequences and datasets
dimension: Behavioral Metrics for Secure AI Tool Usage
summary: Sequential structure is a key feature of multiple domains of natural cognition and behavior, such as language, movement and decision-making.
